columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the project role.

columns.name: permissions
columns.description: The list of permissions associated with the role.

columns.name: identifier
columns.description: The unique identifier for the project role.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The timestamp when the project role was created.

columns.name: is_custom_role
columns.description: Indicates whether the role is a custom role.
